text: 1point 2 The role of the hormone human chorionic gonadotropin (HCG) during early pregnancy is to (only one option is correct) (O stimulate LH to initiate menstruation (O maintain the corpus luteum to secrete oestrogen and progesterone (O initiate negative feedback to the hypothalamus to prevent oestrogen and progesterone secretion (O stimulate oxytocin secretion which will cause uterine contraction During pregnancy the hormones which are expected to be increased are (choose all the options that are correct) [J Oestrogen (J Follicle stimulating hormone (FSH) () Progesterone () Luteinizing hormone (LH)
